This message displays information about SVs which are either known to be visible orcurrently tracked by the receiver. All signal related information corresponds to the subset ofsignals specified in Signal Identifiers.

column6: GPS time of week of the navigation epoch.See the description of iTOW for details.

Elevation (range: +/-90), unknown if out ofrange
